Question: On December 13, 2008, this person guest starred on The Naked Brothers Band, a Nickelodeon rock- mockumentary television show.
Hints: On December 18 through 20, 2009, this person performed in the Candlelight Processional at Epcot in Walt Disney World.
This person hosted the 2001 documentary short, The Making of A Charlie Brown Christmas.
This person made a guest appearance on the hit television show 30 Rock, in which she played herself.
